üëå FAAM (Facebook Ads Account Manager) is a useful tool to efficiently manage your advertising accounts, business accounts and pages on Facebook.

ü™Ñ Key features:
1. Advertising Account Management: FAAM allows you to easily track cost and performance metrics of your Facebook advertising campaigns from one place.
2. Business Account and Page Management: In addition to ad management, FAAM helps you manage your business accounts and pages on Facebook.
3. Data Summarization and Aggregation: While FAAM does not completely replace traditional management methods, it summarizes and aggregates the necessary data for you, saving time and increasing work productivity.
4. Useful Supplementary Tools: Alongside its core features, FAAM offers useful tools like pixel sharing, ad account sharing, finding Facebook UID via URL and two-factor authentication to help you flexibly and safely manage and secure your accounts.
5. Simple and User-Friendly Interface: FAAM is designed with a friendly and easy-to-use interface that saves you time and improves work efficiency.
6. Personal Information Security: We are committed to protecting your personal information. FAAM ensures the safety and security of all your Facebook accounts and data.

üÜì All current features of the app will be completely free for users. We are committed to delivering the best experience to our community at no cost.

üì® If you encounter any issues while using FAAM or you have an idea you want to contribute, please contact us via Telegram at https://t.me/toandev95. We are always ready to listen and assist you in making FAAM a better application that caters best to your needs.
